artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Gifuya Seichichi
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: unattached diptych; male figure at R thrusting fan across image, toward figure at L; figure at L is in blue clothing with swirling tan/yellow cloud pattern on sleeves; figure at R has brown clothing with white floral pattern; each figure has a sword
dimension: 14 1/8 × 9 5/8 in. (35.88 × 24.45 cm) (image, sheet, each sheet; vertical ōban diptych)
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳桐 {Yoshikiri} | Censor seal: 戌六改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga}
text: Related to the play Kanadehon Chūshingura 仮名手本忠臣蔵, performed at the Nakamura Theater in the 3rd month of 1862.
title: Actors Bandō Kamezō I as Kō no Moronao (R) and Sawamura Tosshō II as Enya Hangan
